Nightlight/Termitron::

"We could built a new Colony"said a voice behind them.

Nightlight moved a saw someone that she met "Termitron???"


"Greetings Queen"said happily the bug bot"We can built a new colony 
and if your Ladyship is agree Termitron will find the best place to 
built a new colony..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      "I agree.  But where could we go?  I don't know of any other 
abandoned bases."  He frowns in thought.
